video_title: How To Make Friends As A Man
transcript:
how do you develop friendships as a dude
so I think the first problem with this
is that there's this idea that we
develop friendships I don't think that's
how male bonds actually form there isn't
like sort of this intentional
development I think the biggest thing
about developing friendships as a man is
you walk up to another dude and you say
literally hey you want to hang out
sometime there doesn't need to be an
important subtext there doesn't need to
be an emphasis on like long-term
engagement or becoming vulnerable in
fact the extent of vulnerability for
friendships with men at the very
beginning is hey do you want to hang out
sometime
